Interface MealSubject

All Known Implementing Classes:
ConcreteModel
public interface MealSubject

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    addObserver(MealObserver o)
    Adds an observer that will be notified when a meal is updated.
    void
    notifyObservers(Meal m, Nutrition n)
    Notifies all registered observers about a meal and its nutritional value.
    void
    removeObserver(MealObserver o)
    Removes a previously added observer.

    • addObserver

      Adds an observer that will be notified when a meal is updated.

    • removeObserver

      void removeObserver(MealObserver o)
      Removes a previously added observer.
      Parameters:
      o - the observer to remove

    • notifyObservers

      void notifyObservers(Meal m, Nutrition n)
      Notifies all registered observers about a meal and its nutritional value.
      Parameters:
      m - the meal
      n - the nutritional value of the meal
